: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus Prime: Of course. I'm honored to have each and every member here as my crew. You included.
 "cardhead649 <cardhead649@...>" <cardhead649@...> wrote:Flicker::

"Really?"  He does his best to sound hopeful.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus Prime: Listen, Flicker. Everyone here is useful and needed. 
You are a valuble member of this crew.
>  "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:Flicker::
> 
> Flicker comes inside and sits down next to Rodimus.  "I feel, well, 
> sort of useless.  I mean, I'm a technician and all, but you've 
> already got Wheeljack to do that stuff.  And from what I've seen, 
he 
> does it better."  He's playing the crowd, so to speak - like a true 
> Predacon, Flicker would never really admit that someone else was 
> better at something than him.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > 
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > Rodimus Prime: Sure, come in.
> > Roddy sits on the couch.
> > Rodimus Prime: So what did you need to talk about?
> >  "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>" <cardhead649@y...> 
wrote:Flicker::
> > 
> > "Uh, he's ... not doing too great." Flicker says glumly.  "He's 
in 
> > the CR right now.  I can't figure out what's wrong with him."
> > 
> > Flicker makes a quick check up and down the hall to make sure 
> there's 
> > nobody else around.  "There's ... something else I'd like to talk 
> > about .... Can I come in?  I'd rather not go broadcasting this if 
I 
> > don't have to."
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000 <airly2002@h...>" 
> > <airly2002@h...> wrote:

> > > 
> > > Elita started to fell sleep, Nightlight watched her but she

> > > > Rodimus Prime: No, you rest. I'll get it.
> > > > Rodimus gets up and moves to the door. He opens it to see 
> Flicker.
> > > > Rodimus Prime: Hey, Flicker. What's up? Hows Condor?
> > > >  "airly2000 <airly2002@h...>" <airly2002@h...> 
> > > wrote:Condro/Nightlight/Elita:
> > > >  
> > > > "Somone is knoking, Rodimus"said softly "do yu like that I 
see

> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 
<cardhead649@y...>" 
> > > > <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > > > Flicker::
> > > > > 
> > > > > Meanwhile, the spy-bot watches Conder in the CR.  He'd be 
> > coming 
> > > > out 
> > > > > soon, which worries Flicker.  He needed to get his target 
> > > > quickly.  
> > > > > Palming the neural disruptor again, he heads to Rodimus and 
> > > > > Nightlight's quarters and knocks on the door.
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000 <airly2002@h...>"

> > > > > >

they 
> > > > started 
> > > > > > to show. Her little nose was pink and he had a shot tail.
> > > > > >

looking

want

baby

and

> > > > the
